dct_title_s: Tabula totius orbis terrarum exhibens declinationes magneticas, ad annum 1700 composita ab Edmundo Halleyo simul cum inclinationibus a Poundio observatis
dct_description_sm: California shown as a labeled island with an indented northern coast and no place names.
Australia is partially mapped and New Zealand is not shown.

From Petri van Musschenbroek's Physicae experimentales, et geometricae, de magnete, tuborum capillarium vitreorum-que speculorum attractione, magnitudine terrae, cohaerentia corporum firmorum dissertationes: ut et ephemerides meteorologicae ultrajectinae.
